name: Slash of Sword 2
summary:
You were accused of a crime you did not commit and were sent to fight in the arena as punishment. Bloody and tactical fights for survival of varying complexity with many rivals await you. Try to learn skills to become more proficient, as well as explore locations and interact with characters to achieve justice!
Will you try to make decisions about whether to help a wounded man who was recently a bandit and robbed ordinary travelers? Whether to tell the owner about the treasure you found? Or maybe whether to let the girl go with the robber who kidnapped her, or deal with him and return the girl to her father? You decide…
